suppress.notes: file name: itext-2.1.7.js10.jar CVE-2017-9096, CVE-2022-24197, CVE-2022-24196 affect older versions of itext 2.1.7. Upgraded to itext 2.1.7.js10 which includes security patches from JasperReports. The project uses dynamicreports-core 6.20.1 which brings in the patched version of itext.
file name: itext-2.1.7.js10.jar CVE-2022-24197 affects older versions of itext. Upgraded to patched version 2.1.7.js10.
file name: itext-2.1.7.js10.jar CVE-2022-24196 affects older versions of itext. Upgraded to patched version 2.1.7.js10.
